name: Major League Baseball 2K7
description:
Back of Case - Nintendo DS (US) (from Ad Blurbs)

Major League Action on the go!

  • Touch screen Batting and Pitching - Intuitively control swings, pitches, and fielders like never before with the touch screen power of the Nintendo DS system.
  • Multiple Game Modes - Choose from several exciting game modes including Home Run Derby, the All Star Game and Post Season.
  • Wireless Connectivity - Take your game wireless and enjoy endless hours of player-to-player matches.
  • Choose from 1 to 4 2K Legends teams, consisting of Johnny Bench, Brooks Robinson, Bruce Sutter and over 75 more all-time greats,
